tool_description: Builds Docker container images from source code or Dockerfile, with support for multi-stage builds and custom base images.

source_path.description: Path to source code or Dockerfile directory

error_messages: Source path not found: Verify source_path exists and contains valid Dockerfile or source code.
Base image pull failed: Check base_image name and registry availability.
Build argument format error: Use KEY=VALUE format for build_args entries.
Unsupported architecture: Use one of [amd64, arm64].
Build process failed: Check Dockerfile syntax and source code compilation errors.
usage: Provide image name and source path. Optionally specify base image, build arguments, and target architecture for custom builds.

image_id.description: Unique identifier of the built image

image_size_mb.description: Size of the built image in megabytes
